@ScrubKing "Are you into fat disgusting, ugly men ? I am not" That's your whole argument.  Complaining about something you don't like, assuming others don't like it either, and then arguing when people tell you to fuck off.  You have built this entire idea in your head that "since I don't like it, most people don't like it," and then concocted this bizarre situation where somehow people are "tolerating" it and only "pretending" to like it and somehow the entire "industry" has collectively decided to push what you don't like because they think it would make them money.  If it didn't make them money, or if what you want made them more money, they wouldn't do it.  They would notice that doujins made a certain way would sell more and thus do more of those.  You're delusional and dedicating way too much time to porn.  Get perspective and stop arguing about porn.

And having an ugly bastard in is by no means rare. And having a really disgusting case isn't either. How realistic is it really that people are genuinely into fat bastards ? We know the JAV industry only has fat ugly old people in their porn because they think that is their target audience ( pretty insulting tbh) . Artists like ratatatatatatatatatatata74 are booming in popularity because they cover the more spicy content without insulting their audience. What I'm saying is that we could have a lot more better content . And that it is a lot more likely that people tolerate the archetype rather then actually wanting it. While the industry just thinks that their audience are ugly , discussing and fat so they try to cater to them. I don't think nhentai comment sections will change anything but why pretend we are into fat bastards when we likely aren't? Are you into fat disgusting, ugly men ? I am not

First. That is an empty point that litteraly means the same . Second. Same logical fallacy . 

Third. If we simply accumulate all the fat bastards we can quickly gather the time requirements you just made up. 4th . Do you really think it's realistic that so many people have a fetish for fat bastards that it warrants having so many of them ? I do not have any statistics at hand but i doubt that a lot of people are into fat ugly peoe considering people tend to be attracted to the exact opposite. 
5th ironically i actually made points in pretty much all comments and never went "wahhh" while you just started making a point and stopped doing "wahhh" .

6th. There is a lot of porn on this website to be sure but if we simply take the impregnation focus again and take it as an example it is really not difficult at all to keep up with all impregnation releases . There are propably about 3 or so per week. I never actually kept track but that is my assumption. So content burns down pretty fast

@ScrubKing First, I didn't say you were an incel, I said you were acting like one.  Second, I didn't say you couldn't critique porn, I just said it makes you fucking retarded.  It's not a TV show or a movie that you pay to see and takes up hours of your day.  It's something you look at for 5-10 minutes that gets you off, and it's very niche.  People have certain fetishes and others don't, to be like "THIS DOESN'T APPEAL TO ME...WAAAAH!" makes you retarded.  A normal person would just realize they don't like it and look for something else.  And if you look at the 400,000+ doujins on this website and be like "WAAAAAH!  Because there too much fat bastard on this website, there's less content for me!" among 400,000 searchable-by-fetish doujins you're either too stupid or too lazy to use this website.  There are a fuck-ton of doujins even if you black out the BBM tag.  Stop thinking the world revolves around your tastes and you can't be wrong and fuck off.

Let's just make an easy example ( so even you understand) . Presume we are into impregnation. A shit load of those doujins have the fat bastard archetype. 
So if we just blacklist those we miss out on a lot of content. So as long as we like impregnation more then we dislike fat bastards that is not a good trade off. However that doesn't make the fat bastard archetype good. That wasnt so difficult right ? On the other hand .why would fat bastards make them better ? Are they relatable ? Or appealing? Or anything positive? You tell me xD

Also by what logic does porn form an exception from the simple logic we just established. What does it matter whenever it's porn or not? Either we follow your logic through and you can't critique anything. Or we don't because it's obviously stupid. Why should there be an exception for porn ? Why do I even have to explain this contradiction to you? Isn't it kind of obvious ?
